svg.font-family: SauceCodePro Nerd Font, Source Code Pro, Courier

g.text: Builds a badge indicating your project's license(s) and those of its
<typeName>=<color> (<color>: CSS-Color|Hex as: ffffff|Hex stroke as s{ffffff})
<typeName>=<color> (<color>: CSS-Color|Hex as: ffffff|Hex stroke as s{ffffff})
